questions.question:
Before you begin, please check:
1.  Customer has originals of each document
2.  Documents appear genuine and original (photocopies not acceptable)
3.  None of the documents are expired
4.  Name is consistent across documents or if there is a difference, that the customer has provided with a change of name or marriage certificate showing the name changes.
5.  Customer appears to be the same person shown in the photo ID documents (eyes, nose, mouth, cheekbones)
If any of the above checks fail, you should not proceed as the customer’s verification of identity will not comply.

Before you begin, please check:
1.  Client has originals of each document
2.  Documents appear genuine and original (photocopies not acceptable)
3.  None of the documents are expired
4.  Name is consistent across documents (and any Marriage or Change of Name Certificate)
5.  Client appears to be the same person shown in the photo ID documents (eyes, nose, mouth, cheekbones)
If any of the above checks fail, your client's verification of identity may not comply with the Registrar's verification of identity standard.
Take a photo of any additional documents that may need to be included

Before you begin, please check:
1.  Client has originals of each document
2.  Documents appear genuine and original (photocopies not acceptable)
3.  None of the documents are expired
4.  Name is consistent across documents (and any Marriage or Change of Name Certificate)
5.  Client appears to be the same person shown in the photo ID documents (eyes, nose, mouth, cheekbones)
•  Client's signature is consistent with their ID documents
If any of the above checks fail, please do not proceed.

Please read the following to the client "Your personal details will now be encrypted and secured in accordance with Australian privacy law for secure access by your adviser to complete your property transaction."
Please read the following to the client "Your personal details will now be encrypted and secured in accordance with Australian privacy law for secure access by PEXA to complete your registration."
Firm name and Date of Birth
Land Transfer Form: Take photo of page showing real property details and signature.
Land Transfer Form: Take photo of additional page (if necessary).
Other Document: Take photo of relevant page of document.
I, {{clientFullName}}, confirm that I have been identified today using original identity documents presented by me.
Verifier's certification (continued)

I, {{agentName}} confirm that the ZipID 5 point check has been complied with:

1.  The customer has provided the documents specified in the booking.
2.  The ID documents reasonably appear genuine and original (no photocopies)
3.  The ID documents have not expired
4.  The name in the ID documents is the same or closely similar as the booking name and is consistent across ID documents (or any name variation is as shown in a Marriage Certificate or Change of Name Certificate)
5.  The customer appears to be the same person shown in any presented photographic ID documents.

* If the customer presented a Client Authorisation Form it was signed by the customer in front me.
Take photo of Signature Card signed by {{clientFullName}}.
Take photo of {{clientFirstName}} from the shoulders up (like a passport photo). No glasses or hat.
Client Authorisation: Take photo of page showing real property details and signature.

Ask {{clientFirstName}} if their conveyancer has requested a "Client Authorisation Form" (A4 doc) be presented at this appointment?

If yes, please ask {{clientFirstName}} to sign the Client Authorisation Form in front of you. Do NOT sign the Form yourself.
Take photo of the signed Client Authorisation Form (if provided).
Mortgage: Take photo of page showing real property details and signature
Mortgage: Take photo of additional page (if necessary).
Appointment of Settlement Agent: Take photo of page showing client details and signature.
Appointment of Settlement Agent: Take an additional photo of the form (if necessary).
Take photo of the entire Change of Name Certificate.
Take a close-up photo of the Change of Name Certificate.
Take photo of the entire Marriage Certificate.
Take a close-up photo of the part of the Marriage Certificate showing the name of the bride and groom.
Additional photo of the Marriage Certificate
Take photo of passport photo page.
Take a photo of the signature page of the passport (if it separate to the photo page)

FPV.name: Foreign Passport with Australian Resident Visa
FPV.title: Passport

questions.question: Take photo of passport photo page.
Take photo of passport visa label, grant notice or evidence of visa. If client does not have evidence of visa, take another photo of passport at this point.
Take a photo of the signature page of the passport (if it separate to the photo page)
Take photo of English translation (if provided).
Take photo of licence (front)
Take photo of licence (back)
Take photo of card.
Take photo of entire certificate.
Take close-up photo of Name and Date of Birth section.
Take photo of English translation (if provided).
Take photo of entire certificate.
Take close-up photo of Name and Date of Birth section.
Take photo of entire certificate.
Take close-up photo of Name and  Date of Birth section.
Take photo of Medicare card.
Take photo of Centrelink card.
Take photo of Veteran Affairs card.
